title: The Sword and the Exquisiteness - Novel Updates
author: Gu Long   古龍   古龙
description:
The Sword and the Exquisiteness chronicles the adventures of Yu Peiyu in a martial arts world that is filled with danger and deceit.

The leaders of various clans are being killed off and replaced with look-alikes.

What is the conspiracy behind this?
Yu Peiyu finds out...>
